Hawkstone Country Club
Opens in new window
9905 SW 44th Ave
Gainesville, FL 
                                32608
1 352-335-0055

Host An Event
Meetings & Corporate
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Host Your Special Events in Gainesville
Host a fabulous event and enjoy the fruits of your labor along with your guests. Our Private Events Team help with everything from food to decorations to entertainment and our staff makes sure your event is truly memorable. No matter what the event, we'll create the appropriate mood and take the stress out of hosting. (Don't worry, you still get all the credit!)
Start Planning Your Event
We can help with any type of event:
Showers
Anniversary Parties
Birthday Parties
Private Dinners
Banquets
School Parties
Holiday Parties
Business Meetings
Seminars
Rehearsal Dinners
Bar/Bat Mitzvah
Luncheons
Reunions
Charity Events
Private Events Team
Mark Nordman
General Manager
Contact Me
352-335-0055 ext. 8
Contact Me
About Mark
+
Close
Mark Nordman information modal
Mark Nordman
General Manager
Serving since 2022
352-335-0055 ext. 8
Mark.Nordman
352-335-0055 ext. 8
Mark.Nordman
Contact Me
About Mark
A Private Club General Manager for 40 years, Mark has served a total of 19  years with Invited/ ClubCorp,  including 7 here at Hawkstone/ Haile Plantation, and 8 years with Troon Golf. He has led member-owned, corporate-owned and developer-owned Clubs during that successful tenure, including several of the most prestigious Clubs in America: The University Club - Houston, Windsor in Vero Beach, The Loxahatchee Club in Jupiter, and Carolina Country Club in Raleigh among them. Prior to returning to Hawkstone in 2022, Mark served as Chief Operating Officer of the Timber Pines Community Association, one of the largest and most active Club Communities in the country, as well as the Heritage Springs Community Association in Trinity, Fl. He is the recipient of numerous company and industry awards and honors. Originally from Michigan, Mark attended Cranbrook School and then received his B.A. from Michigan State University. Mark and his wife, Maribeth, have been married for 37 years and lived in Alachua County since 2003. Maribeth is a small business owner, an active equestrian, and an alumnus of the University of South Florida. Their daughter, Alexa, is an attorney at Carlton Fields in Tampa, having attended Oak Hall School in Gainesville and receiving her BS, MS and JD all from The University of Florida.
Contact Me

Hawkstone Country Club Who We Are Golf Amenities Host An Event Contact Us Membership at Hawkstone At Hawkstone Country Club, our traditions of excellent service, a caring and friendly staff, and outstanding amenities combine to create relationships that last a lifetime. When you join Hawkstone, we’ll strive to exceed your expectations every time you visit us. With access to the entire Invited network, you’ll be able to get the same great service at any club you visit. As a Member, you’ll also get local golf and dining benefits and enjoy benefits worldwide as you travel when you upgrade. Schedule A Tour Opens in new tab View Our Membership Brochure Membership Categories Hawkstone’s championship golf course offers you Gainesville golf at its finest. Great care is taken to integrate our country club course into the spectacular natural setting. As a result, the fairways wind deliberately through a carefully preserved upland hammock spotted with such native species as majestic live oaks, wild plum and dogwood trees. Other Gainesville golf courses truly take a back seat to this premier golf club. Our golf course offers you the exciting challenge you desire in a breathtaking natural layout. Learn More Twilight Golf Membership Member, spouse, and dependent children enjoy full use and enjoyment of all amenities including unlimited golf with cart fees only, * tennis, fitness, pickleball, use of both of the Club’s pool facilities, and dining & social activities.  *Golf Tee times may be made after 2 p.m. Tennis Membership Members and their dependents enjoy access to the Tennis Center, Fitness Center, pools, pickleball, and social & dining activities. Athletic Membership Members and their dependents enjoy access to the Fitness Center, pools, pickleball, and social & dining activities. Full Membership Member, spouse, and dependent children enjoy full use and enjoyment of all amenities including unlimited golf with cart fees only, tennis, fitness, pickleball, use of both of the Club’s pool facilities, and dining & social activities. Young Executive For Members under the age of 41. Member, spouse, and dependent children enjoy full use and enjoyment of all amenities including unlimited golf with cart fees only, tennis, fitness, pickleball, use of both of the Club’s pool facilities and dining & social activities.

Your Membership, Recognized Nationwide We’re Excited to Introduce XLife! (formerly O.N.E./Signature Gold) Now you can add even more enjoyment to your ClubLife and extend your membership across the country! XLife provides extraordinary benefits and experiences, whether you’re enjoying your home Club, exploring your local area or venturing out to destinations nationwide. With access to an industry-leading network of hundreds of private Clubs, you can play like a pro and stay on-property at renowned resorts. Depending on the level of benefits, you can also take advantage of great hotel benefits, car rentals and more* for your next night on the town or weekend getaway. Enjoy your best life with XLife! Get In Touch * Fees may apply Mark Nordman General Manager Contact Me 352-335-0055 ext. 8 Contact Me About Mark + Close Mark Nordman information modal Mark Nordman General Manager Serving since 2022 352-335-0055 ext. 8 Mark.Nordman 352-335-0055 ext. 8 Mark.Nordman Contact Me About Mark A Private Club General Manager for 40 years, Mark has served a total of 19  years with Invited/ ClubCorp,  including 7 here at Hawkstone/ Haile Plantation, and 8 years with Troon Golf. He has led member-owned, corporate-owned and developer-owned Clubs during that successful tenure, including several of the most prestigious Clubs in America: The University Club - Houston, Windsor in Vero Beach, The Loxahatchee Club in Jupiter, and Carolina Country Club in Raleigh among them. Prior to returning to Hawkstone in 2022, Mark served as Chief Operating Officer of the Timber Pines Community Association, one of the largest and most active Club Communities in the country, as well as the Heritage Springs Community Association in Trinity, Fl. He is the recipient of numerous company and industry awards and honors. Originally from Michigan, Mark attended Cranbrook School and then received his B.A. from Michigan State University. Mark and his wife, Maribeth, have been married for 37 years and lived in Alachua County since 2003. Maribeth is a small business owner, an active equestrian, and an alumnus of the University of South Florida. Their daughter, Alexa, is an attorney at Carlton Fields in Tampa, having attended Oak Hall School in Gainesville and receiving her BS, MS and JD all from The University of Florida. Contact Me Harmony Monk Membership Director Contact Me Contact Me About Harmony + Close Harmony Monk information modal Harmony Monk Membership Director Serving since 2024 Harmony.Monk Harmony.Monk Contact Me About Harmony Harmony was the very first Membership Director at Hawkstone (Haile Plantation) and served in that capacity from 1995-1998, where she earned Membership Director of the Year honors multiple times. After Hawkstone, Harmony spent the next 26 years with GlaxoSmithKline as a Senior Executive Pharmaceutical Account Manager & Representative. She is a UF Alum, a long-time Gainesville resident and very connected to our community as a whole. We're extremely happy that Harmony rejoined the Hawkstone Team in 2024. Contact Me Refer A Member Refer your friends and family for Membership at Hawkstone. Refer A Member Today! Hold on, there's more... • Love teeing off during your travels? • Enjoy discounts when you dine? Get all of this and more with XLife. Events
Meetings & Corporate
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Plan The Perfect Gainesville Event
Whether you're a Member or not, you're welcome to host your next event with us!
The Private Events Team is ready to help you plan your event. Our Club provides beautiful private dining rooms for all occasions. With great views, great privacy and perfect service, your events bring lasting memories. Our professional staff works with you through the planning stage and is there for your event to make sure everything is perfect.
Contact Our Event Sales Staff
Explore Events
Your Event, Your Way
Our Private Event Team will help you coordinate all the details and our staff will provide the exceptional service your guests will rave about long after your event is over.
Start Planning Your Event
Explore Events
Meetings & Corporate Events
Explore new ways to build company morale, inspire employee efficiency and impress business associates by hosting your next corporate meeting or event at Hawkstone. We provide personalized service and offer an array of professional accommodations to cultivate a productive and motivational atmosphere for you and your colleagues.
Schedule a Meeting
Explore Meetings & Corporate
Tournaments & Outings
Entertain your colleagues with a golf outing, put together a tournament for fun, coordinate a groom's golf outing, host your charity’s fundraising tournament, play golf after your next meeting and more. The possibilities are endless. From our amazing golf course to the presentation of the food, service and elegant atmosphere, Hawkstone is the perfect location for your next golf outing.
Schedule an Outing
Explore Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Whether your wedding is intimate or extravagant, our experienced wedding planners are ready to help you with every detail to make sure your day is flawless.
Start Planning your Wedding
Explore Weddings

Mark.Nordman
Contact Me
About Mark
A Private Club General Manager for 40 years, Mark has served a total of 19  years with Invited/ ClubCorp,  including 7 here at Hawkstone/ Haile Plantation, and 8 years with Troon Golf. He has led member-owned, corporate-owned and developer-owned Clubs during that successful tenure, including several of the most prestigious Clubs in America: The University Club - Houston, Windsor in Vero Beach, The Loxahatchee Club in Jupiter, and Carolina Country Club in Raleigh among them. Prior to returning to Hawkstone in 2022, Mark served as Chief Operating Officer of the Timber Pines Community Association, one of the largest and most active Club Communities in the country, as well as the Heritage Springs Community Association in Trinity, Fl. He is the recipient of numerous company and industry awards and honors. Originally from Michigan, Mark attended Cranbrook School and then received his B.A. from Michigan State University. Mark and his wife, Maribeth, have been married for 37 years and lived in Alachua County since 2003. Maribeth is a small business owner, an active equestrian, and an alumnus of the University of South Florida. Their daughter, Alexa, is an attorney at Carlton Fields in Tampa, having attended Oak Hall School in Gainesville and receiving her BS, MS and JD all from The University of Florida.

Mark Nordman
General Manager
Serving since 2022
352-335-0055 ext. 8
Mark.Nordman
352-335-0055 ext. 8
Mark.Nordman
Contact Me
About Mark
A Private Club General Manager for 40 years, Mark has served a total of 19  years with Invited/ ClubCorp,  including 7 here at Hawkstone/ Haile Plantation, and 8 years with Troon Golf. He has led member-owned, corporate-owned and developer-owned Clubs during that successful tenure, including several of the most prestigious Clubs in America: The University Club - Houston, Windsor in Vero Beach, The Loxahatchee Club in Jupiter, and Carolina Country Club in Raleigh among them. Prior to returning to Hawkstone in 2022, Mark served as Chief Operating Officer of the Timber Pines Community Association, one of the largest and most active Club Communities in the country, as well as the Heritage Springs Community Association in Trinity, Fl. He is the recipient of numerous company and industry awards and honors. Originally from Michigan, Mark attended Cranbrook School and then received his B.A. from Michigan State University. Mark and his wife, Maribeth, have been married for 37 years and lived in Alachua County since 2003. Maribeth is a small business owner, an active equestrian, and an alumnus of the University of South Florida. Their daughter, Alexa, is an attorney at Carlton Fields in Tampa, having attended Oak Hall School in Gainesville and receiving her BS, MS and JD all from The University of Florida.

Harmony Monk
Membership Director
Serving since 2024
Harmony.Monk
Harmony.Monk
Contact Me
About Harmony
Harmony was the very first Membership Director at Hawkstone (Haile Plantation) and served in that capacity from 1995-1998, where she earned Membership Director of the Year honors multiple times.  After Hawkstone, Harmony spent the next 26 years with GlaxoSmithKline as a Senior Executive Pharmaceutical Account Manager & Representative.  She is a UF Alum, a long-time Gainesville resident and very connected to our community as a whole.  We're extremely happy that Harmony rejoined the Hawkstone Team in 2024.

Contact Me
About Evan
Evan Walker, our Head Golf Professional since 2018 is a Florida native, and graduate of the University of Florida. Evan has worked in the Golf and Country Club industry for more than 10 years. Evan has been playing golf since the age of ten and has always loved the game. Besides golf, Evan enjoys spending time with his wife, Candice, son, Ryan, and he also enjoys attending Florida Gator sporting events.
